column4: Um, my partitions seem to be mounted but when I try to open them it says "You do not have the permissions necessary to view the contents of "hda5"."
Um, my partitions seem to be mounted but when I try to open them it says "You do not have the permissions necessary to view the contents of "hda5"."
how can I change the permissions so that I can access my other partitions
isn't there a graphical disks configuration tool?
